title: 去完機場頂唔住，朋友跳左落來......

replies.msg:
🙏🏻對唔住！騙左你地入來，但真係好重要！

我香港朋友喺英國以局外人睇得更清，尋晚長途打俾我話好重要，一定要加強來做！就係英文文宣！

唔該唔好再同藍絲角力！仍唔好浪費時間同五毛角力！

事實係就算700萬人都係黃絲，都幫唔倒我地打大老虎🐯！

要爭取既係國際關注同國際幫助！再share 野去自己Facebook 同IG 既黃絲friend 睇都只係打飛機！作用實在太細！我地要打贏呢場資訊戰！

就要繼續開發 🔥英文文宣🔥！

就算你英文唔好，都諗辦法將英文新聞share 開去俾外國人、外國平台睇！

———————————————————————-

｛麻煩廣傳｝Please forward

🇭🇰 現時香港示威局勢有一大漏洞：文宣極缺乏英文版本 及 缺乏散播英文版本至外國平台及外國人士，無助國際社會認清事實、討論及關注香港局勢。

🇭🇰 The current protest situation has a big loophole: The spread of information significantly lacks English versions and lack the spread of such information to international platforms, which do not help the international society to see the truth clearly, to discuss and to pay attention to the current situation Hong Kong people are facing .

🖊 已有既向外國聯署既簽名活動、登報等等係正確及強大既文宣策略。現在要加強即時新聞報導及種種消息的英文版本編寫及翻譯。

🖊 The already exiting international petition and posting ads on international papers are the right strategies to spread the English information. Now the live news updates and other information require editing and translation in English.

🙏🏻請各位無論英文好唔好既人，都複製廣傳多d英文版本新聞俾外國媒體、外國社交平台既朋友及外國重要人士知道。

🙏🏻Please no matter your English is good or poor, copy and share more English version of the news to foreign media, forign friends using foreign social media platforms and important people in foreign countries to let them know the situation.

🙇🏻‍♀️英文好既，請多多用英文打status, 以便英文消息流通！

🙇🏻‍♀️Those who have good English proficiency, please type your social media statuses in English to facilitate the circulation of the news in English.

🐦 Twitter 喺美國係一大社交平台，仍需英文文宣人士開發🙏🏻。

🐦 Twitter is a widely used social media platform in the America and requires more people to spread information in English.

💢英文消息不流通已導致部份在港的外國人士誤解示威活動為示威者的蓄意暴力活動及年輕人搗亂的行為。現極需要將更全面的消息帶給國際，包括：警方使用過份武力、警方為政府執行政治目的、政府無視民意、示威者生命安全受打壓威脅及嚴重受傷、疑似中國公安及警察滲入示威者中搞事等等。

💢The poor circulation of English news have caused some expats in Hong Kong to misunderstand the whole movement as protesters purposefully acting violent and young people causing disturbances. There is a great need to spread more comprehensive and fair news to the international community, such as 💪🏻police using excessive violence on peaceful protestors , police performing duties for the government for political purposes,the government ignoring its people’s requests, protestors’ safety and lives threatened or even severely injured, suspected Chinese police and Hong Kong police disguised as protesters to stir violence in peaceful protests.

✍️ Please Help ! ✍️
唔撚睇
冷處理 聚焦818
